Container.Name: vm_custom_icons
Container.Overview: Custom VM Icon Manager v2 gives you a standalone web GUI to browse, preview and choose from roughly 90 VM icons, organised into macOS, Windows, Linux, FreeBSD and Other sections, plus a Custom upload area so you can add your own icons as well. It installs directly into Unraid’s VM Manager. Simply set the container to auto-start and your selected icons remain persistent and reload on every reboot.

Config.Name: SUCESS_TUNE
Config.Description: Enable a notification tune when icons are loaded into the VM manager. (For this feature to work, your server must have a beep speaker attached. These are very cheap if you want one and available for a couple of $ each)

Config.Name: Unraid VM icons path
Config.Description: Path on the Unraid server to where the VM icons are stored. Do not change this path.

Config.Name: beep speaker
Config.Description: Used if you have a beep speaker in your server and you want to have an audible notification when new icons are loaded.

Config.Name: UNRAID_API
Config.Description: UNRAID API KEY - not currently used for future features.

Config.Name: VERSION
Config.Description: Docker container version, do not change this value.
